alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 10:56PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lunenburg County through 1145 PM EDT... At 1055 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Drakes Branch, or near Keysville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small trees and blow around unsecured objects. Wind impacting handling of high profile vehicles. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rehoboth around 1120 PM EDT. Lunenburg around 1130 PM EDT. Victoria around 1140 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Gary, Loves Mill, Arvins Store, Nutbush, Scholfield, Plantersville, Blevins Corner, Pleasant Grove, Meherrin and Oral Oaks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
